thread.title: Little Mix Jesy Nelson is aiming to try something new this Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Little Mix Jesy Nelson is aiming to try something new this Valentine's Day

author: Halina Watts
title: Little Mix Jesy Nelson is aiming to try something new this Valentine's Day
text:
Celebs Little Mix Jesy Nelson is aiming to try something new this Valentine's Day Little Mix singer - who endured a 'horrendous' break-up in the autumn - is looking to try out the transatlantic talent on tour Share Jesy Nelson is looking for love this Valentine's Day (Photo: Getty Images North America) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Fancy-free Little Mix star Jesy Nelson ­is aiming to try out the trans­atlantic talent on Valentine’s Day. 
The unattached singer has her sights set on flirting with a fit American guy on the most ­romantic day of the year, the Sunday People can reveal. 
Jesy is well placed because she and the girls will be in Nashville to support Ariana Grande on her Dangerous Woman tour. 
But if she draws a blank there will plenty more chances – Little Mix have another 30 US gigs. 
The slimmed-down and ­impressively toned singer ­endured a “horrendous” split from Rixton’s frontman Jake Roche , 24, in November. 
Jesy, 25, said: “I’m free, ­single and loving life. I’d really like to experience flirting with an American guy. That would be nice.” Read More Jesy Nelson shows off amazing weight loss and super toned tummy in busty snap Jake Roche and Jesy Nelson broke up in November (Photo: Getty) 
She said breaking up with Jake, son of actor Shane Richie and Loose Women’s Coleen Nolan, was “one of the worst pains” but insisted they are still pals. 
She said: “I’ve found a lot of ­independence. I think you learn a lot more about yourself when you’re single.” 
Bandmate Jade Thirlwall, 24, reckons dating will be easier for Jesy in America. She said: “You’re in different states, so if it doesn’t go your way, you’re like, ‘Oh well, I’ll never see you again.’” Read More Little Mix then and now: Group's amazing transformation from X Factor hopefuls to pop sensations Little Mix are supporting Ariana Grande on her US tour (Photo: Getty Images) 
Jesy told a radio station she loved first dates and is looking for a “weird, fun, sassy and spontaneous” man. 
She added: “I do love a tat and someone who looks naughty – ­preferably a boxer. I’m really fussy.” 
Her bandmate Leigh-Anne Pinnock, 25, is hoping the tour will be spiced up by a visit from her football star boyfriend, Burnley’s Andre Gray. Like us on Facebook
